job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-15T18:32:28.000Z", "description": "

Unity Software Engineer \u2013 Perm \u2013 Remote


The end client is unable to sponsor or transfer visas for this position; all parties authorized to work in the US without sponsorship are encouraged to apply.


Our Client is seeking a Unity Software Engineer.


Role Description


\u2022 Building and debugging frameworks, tools, and applications.

\u2022 Tracking and reporting on project status.

\u2022 Interfacing closely with various teams including quality assurance, server developers, machine learning engineers, and business managers to translate requirements and constraints into native software.

\u2022 Working with the team to identify and implement data-driven improvements to systems and processes.

\u2022 Clearly communicating with the team progress made, define deliverables, and help set timelines.

\u2022 Working on code remediation and improving application performance.

\u2022 Collaboration with team members (Quality Assurance, Development, Operations) to determine possible solutions for any problems or issues


Skills & Requirements


\u2022 6+ years of experience shipping production-grade C# and Unity applications.

\u2022 Hands-on experience with mixed reality, AR & VR development.

\u2022 Understanding of how to keep app performance and user experience a top priority.

\u2022 Familiarity and a general understanding of front-end/back-end web development, cloud platforms, and web stack development is a plus.

\u2022 Self-starter with a mindset of continuous improvement and growth.

\u2022 Experience with team application development, CI/CD, and VCS systems like GitHub.

\u2022 Comfort with incremental code testing and deployment.

\u2022 Strong communication skills and ability to work in a fast-paced small team environment.

\u2022 Education: BS/BE in CS or equivalent.


Why Hays?


You will be working with a professional recruiter who has intimate knowledge of the Information Technology industry and market trends . Your Hays recruiter will lead you through a thorough screening process in order to understand your skills, experience, needs, and drivers. You will also get support on resume writing, interview tips, and career planning, so when there\u2019s a position you really want, you\u2019re fully prepared to get it.


Nervous about an upcoming interview? Unsure how to write a new resume?


Visit the Hays Career Advice section to learn top tips to help you stand out from the crowd when job hunting.


Hays is an Equal Opportunity Employer.


Drug testing may be required; please contact a recruiter for more information.
